answerText: divergence [10] The divergence of the curl of a vector field is always equal to this value.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Chicago C & South Carolina A | 3 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For a continuously differentiable input, this value is merely equal to du dx plus dv dy plus dw dz. For 10 points each: [10] Name this vector-valued operation often symbolized del dot, which is positive near sources and negative near sinks.
